content:
I don't know if this is related but ...

  1. HREX history filedoes not contain current ballot version 0.2.0
  2. The Alerts guide that references a profile in there is getting the following error. 
ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.davinci-alerts: ImplementationGuide.dependsOn[1].uri    error   URL value
'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-hrex/ImplementationGuide/davinci-hrex' does not resolve
  1. as well as this link error which resolved when clicked on...:
index.html#/html/body/div/div/div/div/div/p/a at Line 208, column 821   error   The link 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-
hrex/history.html' for "Da Vinci Health Record Exchange (HRex)" cannot be resolved

@Grahame Grieve
what about #2 - that should be fixed to?
not yet, I am deleting all packages and caches and rerunning....

still getting bad links to HREX for the DaVinci Alerts IG

source: https://github.com/HL7/davinci-alerts/
do you really want to reference the history? like, really really?
Why is that a problem? it is a handy stable link to igs instead of using variables or absolute urls.

one of few remaining issues for Alerts Guide: bad links to HREX:

See http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-alerts/qa.html
if you really want to register the history, you can. The IG publisher doesn't know about the history file, but FMG won't fail it because of that
I can create a ballot version link..
